instructions: Open a web page in Chrome. To open the menu, swipe up and then right in one smooth motion. The menu is a circle or a list, depending on your TalkBack settings. Circle menu: To explore the menu, drag your finger. To choose an item, lift your finger. List menu: To explore the menu, swipe right or left. To choose an item, double-tap. After the local context menu closes, swipe right to move forward or left to move back using the chosen navigation setting.

Open a web page in Chrome. Swipe left once to go to More options, then double-tap. Swipe left several times to go to Settings, then double-tap. On the Settings screen, select Accessibility . Turn on Simplified view .
